title: United States Treasury
credit_line: Patrons Art Fund: gift of Mr. and Mrs. John F. Walton, Jr
provenance_text: Captain Charles W. Batchelor [1823-1896], Pittsburgh, by 1879; Captain Lawrence, Port Washington, NY, by 1950; Hirschl and Adler Galleries and Newhouse Galleries, New York, 1950; Private collection, after 1950 until 1958; Hirschl and Adler Galleries, New York, by 1958; purchased by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Museum, Pittsburgh, PA, 1958.

creator.birth_place: East Liverpool (Columbiana county, Ohio, United States)
